data.title: Ari Shaeps - Biography | Century City
data.meta_description: As a real estate attorney, Ari Shaeps plays an integral role in the progress and development of buildings from their ground breaking to the completion of construction.
data.meta_site_name: Allen Matkins  - Ari Shaeps - Biography | Century City
data.text:
Ari has advised on over $14 billion in construction contracts, counting among his projects iconic developments such as San Francisco’s Salesforce Tower. Along the way, he has developed strong working relationships with most of California’s major design firms and contractors, which enables him to streamline efficiencies into optimized deals for his clients. He leverages his experience and market knowledge to anticipate and mitigate risks, working across the table from a diverse cross section of constituents. Ari’s practice is collaborative and deal-oriented.

Ari is an avid surfer and traveler, and he combines his two passions as often as possible. He resides in Venice, California, with his wife and two children.

ACCOLADES
